description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows mobile broadband driver remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-43536):

1. Access Windows Update or the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Download and install the appropriate update following the links provided below for your Windows version.
3. Restart your computer to ensure all patches are correctly applied.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses the vulnerability related to URL redirection to untrusted sites, which may lead to remote code execution.
- Ensure that the Windows version matches one of the build numbers before applying the updates:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.26100.2033 - KB5044285
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.4317 - KB5044284
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.4317 - KB5044285
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.5011 - KB5044273
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2: 10.0.19044.5011 - KB5044273
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for 32-bit: 10.0.19045.5011 - KB5044273
- Download links:
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running one of the affected build numbers.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
